title: LF Diamond + players for Ranked 5s (serious team)
body:
LF 2 Diamond + Players to join my ranked Team:

Mid: D1
Adc: D1
Support: Me
Jungle: ???
Top: ???

Serious players only. not interested in immature players. we all make mistakes so acknowledge what we have done wrong and move forward is my team motto :)

replies.body: Would you happen to have any other team i can join on? I am currently Gold 5 and a serious player. I don't expect to join that team since you are all Diamond players.  Or would you recruit me? I main Top.
